snippet: Kawasakis, Yamahas and a Ducati Monster were among the motorcycles that the authorities said a New York crime ring made disappear; then some of the stolen goods vanished from police storage.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column; seven stolen motorcycles seized along with guns in a gang bust in July are now missing from a police parking lot in the Bronx where they were stored as evidence; investigators are leaning toward the thefts being an inside job, as most of the suspects charged are still behind bars.
lead_paragraph: Kawasakis, Yamahas and a Ducati Monster were among the motorcycles that the authorities said a New York crime ring made disappear; then some of the stolen goods vanished from police storage.

headline.seo: The Mysterious Case of the Twice-Stolen Motorcycles
headline.main: Oops! The Mysterious Case of the Twice-Stolen Motorcycles
headline.print_headline: Oops! The Mysterious Case of the Twice-Stolen Motorcycles
